alert.note: Alert for Humboldt County; Northeastern Nye County; Northern Elko County; Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County; Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range; South Central Elko County; Southeastern Elko County; Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County; Southwest Elko County; White Pine County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 26 at 4:28PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorm and virga will impact portions of southeastern Humboldt, Lander, northeastern Nye, northern White Pine, Elko and Eureka Counties through 530 PM PDT... At 425 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms and Virga in northeastern Nevada. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 50 mph have been occurring under the virga and will continue to do so over the next hour. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Elko, West Wendover, Battle Mountain, Carlin, Eureka, Wells, Charleston, Hickison Summit, Austin, Beowawe, Jiggs, Currie, Gibbs Ranch, Lages Junction, Montello, Dunphy, Oasis, Pinto Summit, Grass Valley and Lamoille. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
